title: Night Train to Munich 1940 colorized (Margaret Lockwood, Rex Harrison)

sources.title: Night Train to Munich 1940 colorized (Margaret Lockwood, Rex Harrison)
sources.description: When the Germans invade Czechoslovakia, a scientist (James Harcourt) flees to England, but his daughter Anna (Margaret Lockwood) is arrested. She escapes from a camp with the aid of a fellow prisoner (Paul Henreid), but the Gestapo follows and manages to capture her and her father. British Secret Service Agent Dickie Randall (Rex Harrison) heads after them, disguised as a senior German Army officer. Margaret Lockwood as Anna Bomasch Rex Harrison as Dickie Randall Paul Henreid as Karl Marsen James Harcourt as Axel Bomasch and returning to the screen after their initial appearance in Hitchcock'a 1938 film "The Lady Vanishes":    Basil Radford as Charters    Naunton Wayne as Caldicott If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
